allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add QuickBurnBHB v2 and v3 with correct network branding

- v3: All pages use ClickBank \(removed BuyGoods/Digistore24 refs\)
- v2: All pages use BuyGoods \(removed ClickBank/Digistore24 refs\)
- Updated testimonial images, product label, logo
- Fixed afftools page: removed Upsell 4, verified all links
- Replaced checkout URLs, tracking scripts, disclaimers, trust badges

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash("C:/Program Files/Git/cmd/git.exe" -C D:/TrustedNutraProducts push quickburnbhb main)

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add QuickBurnBHB v2 \(BuyGoods\) and v3 \(ClickBank\) with correct network branding

- V2: All pages reference BuyGoods only
- V3: All pages reference ClickBank only
- Updated testimonial images, product label, afftools page
- Removed Digistore24 references from both versions

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
